sentences.en: Cut out the banana oil ; flattery will get you nowhere!
sentences.cn: 别花言巧语了, 吹捧 是不会使你捞到好处的!

sentences.en: He is above the insincere flattery.
sentences.cn: 他对这种假惺惺的谄谀不屑一顾.

sentences.en: He is ambitious and susceptible to flattery.
sentences.cn: 他雄心勃勃，而且很喜欢听别人的恭维话。

sentences.en: He is liable to be reached by flattery.
sentences.cn: 他容易被谄媚奉承所打动.

sentences.en: I'm a newcomer and no good at flattery.
sentences.cn: 我是新来的,又不会献殷勤.

sentences.en: John found himself surrounded by insincere flattery.
sentences.cn: 约翰发现自己为虚情假意的奉承阿谀所包围。

sentences.en: Men are often reached by flattery.
sentences.cn: 人常常因受到恭维而动心.

sentences.en: She was pleased by the flattery.
sentences.cn: 她听了这些奉承话而得意起来.

sentences.en: Some people use flattery to get favours.
sentences.cn: 有些人靠阿谀奉承谋求好处.

sentences.en: You're too intelligent to fall for his flattery.
sentences.cn: 你很聪明，不会受他的阿谀奉承所惑。

trans.tran_en: praise that you do not really mean
